channel.title: Need help with a lottery
channel.description: i would like to have a lottery that when i click on a chest, it asks you if you are sure that you want to do the lottery, and when you click yes, it it takes out 50k and adds a random item, or it tells you that you didnt win...is there a way to do this?

item.title: Need help with a lottery
item.dc:creator: @o_b_b_y_k_o o b b y k o
item.description:
@o_b_b_y_k_o wrote:

yes, go to case 185(I think): One Click Objects and add your item case under it. So it would be like:

Case ITEMID://lottery
if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 50000);
deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995) 50000);
ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomLottery();
sendMessage("You have Participated in the Lottery! Good Luck!");
}[/code]
then in item2.java search public static int rat[] then scrol down to the bottom of all those codes and press enter and add:

[code]    public static int lottery[] = 
{ID's, That, You, Want, To, Possibly, Get};

    public static int randomlottery()
    {
         return lottery[(int)(Math.random()*lottery.length)];
    }

There you go, hope I helped!

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 29, 2008, 01:31:08 PM[/size][hr]Sorry, if you want it to add cash. I do not yet know how to add a certain amount of an item yet, so this is all I got. Was this helpful?

SoCcEr!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with a lottery
item.dc:creator: @Artard Artard
item.description:
@Artard wrote:

Fallenscape has something very similar to this. There is this well that you use 10k on and it gives you a random item.
